```{bash}
source config.sh

mkdir -p ${TRIM_DIR}
```

```{bash}
ADAPTER_FASTA="${OUT_DIR}/adapter.fasta"

# https://support-docs.illumina.com/SHARE/AdapterSeq/Content/SHARE/AdapterSeq/TruSeq/CDIndexes.htm
echo ">truseq_read_1
AGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCA
>truseq_read_2
AGATCGGAAGAGCGTCGTGTAGGGAAAGAGTGT
" > $ADAPTER_FASTA
```

```{bash}
SRA_ACCESION="SRR12804466"
TrimmomaticPE \
    -threads $TOTAL_THREADS \
    -phred33 \
    -summary ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_summary.txt \
    ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1.fastq.gz \
    ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2.fastq.gz \
    ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1_paired.fastq.gz \
    ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1_unpaired.fastq.gz \
    ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2_paired.fastq.gz \
    ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2_unpaired.fastq.gz \
    ILLUMINACLIP:${ADAPTER_FASTA}:2:30:10:2:keepBothReads LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 MINLEN:36
```

```{bash}
ls -1 ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/ | wc
```

```{bash}
ls -1 ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/SRR128044??_1.fastq.gz | wc
```

```{bash}
for R1_FASTQ in ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/SRR128044??_1.fastq.gz ; do
    echo $R1_FASTQ
    SRA_ACCESSION=$(basename $R1_FASTQ "_1.fastq.gz")
    echo $R1_FASTQ $SRA_ACCESSION
    TrimmomaticPE \
        -threads $TOTAL_THREADS \
        -phred33 \
        -summary ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_summary.txt \
        ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1.fastq.gz \
        ${RAW_FASTQ_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2.fastq.gz \
        ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1_paired.fastq.gz \
        ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_1_unpaired.fastq.gz \
        ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2_paired.fastq.gz \
        ${TRIM_DIR}/${SRA_ACCESION}_2_unpaired.fastq.gz \
        ILLUMINACLIP:${ADAPTER_FASTA}:2:30:10:2:keepBothReads LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 MINLEN:36
done
```
